title: Ron's Grub Hub
description: A fun restaurant locator based off the character Ron Swanson from Parks & Recreation.

title: Employee Directory
description: A React app that allows users to view, search, and filter their employees.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A full stack application that allows users to enter deposits and expenses both online and offline.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A full-stack blogging application that allows the user to create, edit, and delete blog posts, as well as comment on posts.

title: Tech Blog
description: A full-stack blogging application that allows the user to create, edit, and delete blog posts, as well as comment on posts.

title: The Ultimate Movie List
description: A personal movie database that allows authenticated users store a list of movies they want to watch to make a quick selection on movie night.

title: Note-Taker App
description: A note-taking app that allows the user to create a list of notes for themselves throughout the day.
